sentences.en: He just saw them as superfluous an encumbrance.
sentences.cn: 当哥萨克人追着你满欧洲跑的时候,你需要轻装上路.

sentences.en: I felt I was being an encumbrance to them.
sentences.cn: 我感到自己成了他们的累赘。

sentences.en: Magdalena considered the past an irrelevant encumbrance.
sentences.cn: 玛格达莱娜把过去看作毫不相干的累赘。

sentences.en: Now I should be an encumbrance.
Only by overcoming our weaknesses can we advance without any encumbrance; only by uniting ourselves in our struggle can we be invincible.
sentences.cn: 克服缺点才能轻装前进, 团结战斗才能无往不胜.

sentences.en: The one and only one property encumbrance search engine enabling quick and appropriate business decision - making.
sentences.cn: 全港独有之物业产权负担资料,内容清晰详尽,有助用户作出快捷而适当的商业决策.

trans.tran_en: An encumbrance is something or someone that encumbers you
